metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:wmi57_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:wmi57_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that a wmi57_object with a namespace and wql is supported.

wmi57_test.comment: Test that a wmi57_object with a namespace and wql is supported.

wmi57_object.comment: Retrieves a wmi57_object with a namespace that equals 'root\cimv2' and a wql that equals 'SELECT ProcessId, Name, Description FROM Win32_Process'.
wmi57_object.wql: SELECT ProcessId, Name, Description FROM Win32_Process

wmi57_state.comment: This state represents a wmi57_object that has a namespace that equals 'root\cimv2', a wql equal that equals 'SELECT ProcessId, Name, Description FROM Win32_Process', and has at least one result with a 'processid' field greater than or equal to '0', a 'name' field equal to 'explorer.exe', and a 'description' field that matches the regular expression '.*'.
wmi57_state.wql: SELECT ProcessId, Name, Description FROM Win32_Process
